system.requirements: No Psy Rating or other such Warp Powers, Innate. Elite Advance

description.value: Reduce Fellowship by half (round up), suffer -20 to Fellowship with any with Psy Rating or Psynscience Skill. Can't gain Psychic, Navigator, or Pure Faith powers or any Psychic-related talents or traits. However, become immune to psychic powers (which fail if targeting you), psychic energy directed at you, Daemonic Special Abilities, Warp Weapon Quality, Posession, sorcery, Corruption Points gained from Warp Shock, and Perils of the Warp. Cannot be detected by Psynscience. Within Willpower Bonus metre range reduce Psy Rating of all psykers by X and creatures with Warp Instability take double damage Trait's effects. Indirect attacks, such as telekinesis throwing a rock at you can still hurt. Can increase from level 1 up to 5 by spending 100xp per level.
